rest.schema: {"openapi":"3.0.3","info":{"title":"Flow OpenAPI Specification","description":"OpenAPI specification for the flow","version":"1.0.11"},"servers":[{"url":"https://qa.fastn.ai/api/v1"}],"paths":{"/syncCustomPricing":{"post":{"summary":"syncCustomPricing","operationId":"POST-syncCustomPricing","parameters":[{"in":"header","name":"x-fastn-space-id","description":"x-fastn-space-id Header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"60aecfe8-83ed-4df9-8467-8cf636d8eeff"},"required":false},{"in":"header","name":"stage","description":"stage Header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"DRAFT"},"required":false},{"in":"header","name":"content-type","description":"content-type Header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"application/json"},"required":false},{"in":"header","name":"x-fastn-space-tenantid","description":"x-fastn-space-tenantid Header","schema":{"type":"string","default":""},"required":false}],"requestBody":{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"input":{"title":"JSON","properties":{},"type":"object","description":"Free form JSON"}},"type":"object"}}}},"responses":{"200":{"description":"Success","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"JSON","properties":{},"type":"object","description":"Free form JSON"}}}}},"security":[{"apiKey":[]}]}}},"components":{"securitySchemes":{"apiKey":{"in":"header","name":"x-fastn-api-key","type":"apiKey"},"bearerAuth":{"type":"http","scheme":"bearer"}}}}

internalDatabase.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {{data.var.tableName}} (
	                unique_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
				    customer_id TEXT,
					price_type TEXT,
					price_code TEXT,
					inventory_id TEXT,
                    description TEXT,
                    uom TEXT,
                    warehouse TEXT,
                    promotion BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
                    break_qty TEXT,
                    price TEXT,
                    effective_date TEXT,
                    expiration_date TEXT, 
                    ignore_automatic_line_discounts BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
                    customer_class TEXT, 
                    item_class TEXT,
                    last_modified_date_time TEXT,
                    inventory_id_2 TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS last_acumatica_sync_date(
    tenant_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    last_sync_date TEXT
);

steps.description: This tool is designed to execute the getRecords operation on the Acumatica platform. It requires the JSON payload to strictly match the expected structure (key and type), otherwise, the operation will fail. Always get confirmation from the user before calling the tool.

internalDatabase.query:
INSERT INTO {{data.var.tableName}} (
    unique_id, 
    customer_id,
    price_type, 
    price_code, 
    inventory_id, 
    description, 
    uom, 
    warehouse, 
    promotion, 
    break_qty, 
    price, 
    effective_date, 
    expiration_date, 
    ignore_automatic_line_discounts, 
    customer_class, 
    item_class, 
    last_modified_date_time, 
    inventory_id_2
) 
VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
ON CONFLICT (unique_id)
DO UPDATE SET
    customer_id = EXCLUDED.customer_id,
    price_type = EXCLUDED.price_type,
    price_code = EXCLUDED.price_code,
    inventory_id = EXCLUDED.inventory_id,
    description = EXCLUDED.description,
    uom = EXCLUDED.uom,
    warehouse = EXCLUDED.warehouse,
    promotion = EXCLUDED.promotion,
    break_qty = EXCLUDED.break_qty,
    price = EXCLUDED.price,
    effective_date = EXCLUDED.effective_date,
    expiration_date = EXCLUDED.expiration_date,
    ignore_automatic_line_discounts = EXCLUDED.ignore_automatic_line_discounts,
    customer_class = EXCLUDED.customer_class,
    item_class = EXCLUDED.item_class,
    last_modified_date_time = EXCLUDED.last_modified_date_time,
    inventory_id_2 = EXCLUDED.inventory_id_2;
